about_the_game:
Welcome to Mican! Explore hand crafted dungeons, fight or befriend tons of zany monsters, and discover the ancient truth behind the origin of monsters!

Monsters of Mican is a first person, party based dungeon crawler RPG, often known as a Blobber. The game was heavily inspired by classic PC RPGs such as Might and Magic and Wizardry, with plenty of modern flair and heaps of QOL features.

Features include:

  • Over 250 monster types to fight, befriend, and even talk with

  • Nearly 100 semi-randomized monster traits that greatly change how monsters behave in battle

  • A highly robust character creator with 14 character classes to choose from

  • Hundreds of abilities/spells, including one unique ability exclusive to each class

  • Dozens of passive skills, each with 5 possible rank upgrades

  • Handcrafted dungeons designed with unique mechanics to tell a story environmentally, including three brand new dungeons released with the Vitreous Expansion!

  • Dozens of NPCs with their own stories and personalities

  • Thrilling boss battles

  • A monster arena where you can watch any monsters you choose duke it out!

  • Randomly generated loot (and unique named artifacts) with tons of different enchantments and abilities

  • Monster Buddies, a system that allows you to befriend monsters and then visit or summon them to fight for you

  • 6 post-game challenge dungeons with specific themed rules and conditions

  • Monster Rush Challenge: fight every monster in the game, sequentially.

  • Boss Rush Challenge: fight every boss in the game... ALL AT ONCE!

  • An original soundtrack featuring over 20 unique compositions made in the style of classic 90s CRPGs

  • A robust list of difficulty options and video settings

  • An in-game cheat vendor that will trade you powerful wands for various cheat codes

  • Full gamepad controls

The game takes place on Mican, a world turned upside down long ago by an event called "The Amalgam Anomaly" which birthed hundreds if not thousands of different types of monsters, creatures, half-breed amalgams and other nightmares into the world. The game has you venturing into a mountain at the heart of Spiny Island to discover what the monsters in the caves are up to... and discovering other mysterious secrets about the world in the process.

The Vitreous Expansion introduces three huge new dungeons:

Spinewood Forest- home to the Fairy Queen Bryxialla, this dungeon teems with traps and creatures that want nothing more than to put you in the ground to fertilize the soil. Beware the many illusions and foggy spots in the forest, lest you lose your way...

The Pipeline- brave the stench as you trudge through toxic muck to receive the unique bounty offered by the denizens of the sewer. Prepare to go for a swim as you fight the mighty Dungen Master and proceed to Lord Muffin's lair...

The Butlery- a magically interconnected space meant for storing and processing food served to all inns throughout the world who belong to the Tavern Association. The inner workings of the Butlery though are not for the faint of heart, as you must brave four unique and discrete zones before gaining access to the most prized innkeeper's items within the Vault. 

The Vitreous Expansion introduces many, many other changes including 80+ new monsters, the above-mentioned Monster Arena, a brand new Micapedia, which allows you to view fully animated 3D models of monsters you've defeated (and activate their animations!), and a whole host of other changes and improvements! Adventuring in Mican has never been better!

name: Monsters of Mican

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: N/A
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Game has not been tested enough to determine min GPU/CPU settings, but has many scalability options in-game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: A whimsical party-based first person turn-based dungeon crawler RPG. Discover the origin of Monsters in Mican as you explore unique handcrafted dungeons, battle hundreds of diverse monsters, learn dozens of spells, and find tons of secrets and loot!
